hero.title: CREATIVITY
hero.subtitle2: We do everything to make your brand work

why.title:
WHY
CHOOSE US?
why.text1: To take the brand into work from the beginning to the growth.
why.text2: To release the client from control – and to give the result.

tooltips.result: We focus on delivering measurable outcomes, not just ideas.
tooltips.growth: Helping your brand evolve, expand, and thrive over time.
tooltips.transparency: We believe in open communication and honest processes.
tooltips.responsibility: We take full ownership of our work and its impact.

descriptions.single: One-time visual and digital solutions for a specific task
descriptions.full: Comprehensive solution for brand identity and presence
descriptions.monthly: Monthly subscription for visual and content support

ideal.single: Ideal for: small businesses, events, campaigns
ideal.full: Ideal for: growing businesses and startups
ideal.monthly: Ideal for: brands that want to delegate marketing and design tasks

about.title: ABOUT US
about.text1: At Circle, we don’t just create – we co-create. With brands, people, and cultures. We believe that great ideas emerge where respect, honesty, and responsibility thrive — and we want to make sure every collaboration reflects that.
about.text2: We founded this agency not just to deliver exceptional creative work, but to build a working environment and client culture we’re proud of — one that reflects our mission: to craft meaningful, human-centered creative solutions that shape culture and drive positive impact.
about.text3: Our Code of Conduct is a reflection of that mission. It’s not just a set of rules — it’s our shared agreement on how we choose to do business, treat people, and show up in the world. It’s the foundation that allows creativity, trust, and innovation to flourish.
about.text4: The work is divided into 5 key phases. Each phase marks an important milestone where you receive deliverables and can provide feedback.

discovery.title: Discovery & Research
discovery.desc:
Understanding your goals and brief.
Market, audience, and competitor analysis.
Current brand or project audit.

ideation.title: Ideation & Concept Development
ideation.desc:
Generating ideas aligned with your vision.
Aligning vision and style.
Collaborative refinement and approval.

implementation.title: Implementation & Launch
implementation.desc:
Setting up channels and platforms.
Publishing or delivering final assets.
Coordinating launch activities and promotion.

delivery.title: Delivery & Support
delivery.desc:
Handing over final files and documentation.
Offering guid.

hero.title: Circle Service Package
hero.subtitle: A full-scale brand launch package — designed to cover everything from social media to investor decks.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.note:
The budget for paid promotion and printed products is not included in the price of services and is paid separately.
All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
Clear content deadlines are set in advance and agreed upon by both parties.

hero.title: Semicircle Service Package
hero.subtitle: A flexible package to support partnerships, mini-events, and design production.

marketing.title: Marketing
items: Concept and visual packaging of partnership/collaboration
Mini-event support (poster, story, video invitation, pop-up, welcome zone, photo/video)

pricing.note:
The budget for paid promotion and printed products is not included in the price of services and is paid separately.
All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
Clear content deadlines are set in advance and agreed upon by both parties.
If your desired service isn’t listed, we’re open to custom formats.
